column4: guys im looking for a simple bit of software to scan my local network to view live ips?
something like angry ip scanner for winblows
is it simple, and really im lookin for soething with a gui
nmap-fe is a GUI for nmap :)
In the target you enter 192.168.1.1-100 fro example :)
And you can select Ping Sweep (Scan Type) to see which hosts are up :)
and if i want a bigger range than .0-255?
I thought IPs don't go over 255
You enter the range between the dots.
